mapper.select: select soe.row_id as rowId , soe.name as name , soe.ou_type_cd as ouTypeCd , soex.row_id as holyRowId from landing.S_ORG_EXT soe join landing.S_ORG_EXT_XM soex on soe.row_id = soex.par_row_id where soe.OU_NUM = #{dealerCode} and soex.ATTRIB_12 = to_date(#{holidayDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and soex.type = 'Dealer Local Holiday' order by soe.created desc
select soe.row_id as rowId from landing.S_ORG_EXT soe where soe.OU_NUM = #{dealerCode}
mapper.insert: insert into landing.S_ORG_EXT_XM ( created , created_by , last_upd , last_upd_by , par_row_id , NAME , type , ATTRIB_02 , ATTRIB_03 , ATTRIB_12 ) VALUES ( now() , 'interface' , now() , 'interface' , #{rowId} , to_char(to_date(#{holidayDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM/DD/YYYY') , 'Dealer Local Holiday' , #{holidayDescription} , public.get_dayofweek(to_date(#{holidayDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')) , to_date(#{holidayDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') );
mapper.update: update landing.S_ORG_EXT_XM set last_upd = now() , last_upd_by = 'interface' , NAME = to_char(to_date(#{holidayDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM/DD/YYYY') , ATTRIB_02 = #{holidayDescription} , ATTRIB_03 = public.get_dayofweek(to_date(#{holidayDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')) , ATTRIB_12 = to_date(#{holidayDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') where row_id = #{holyRowId};
